page.title: 04Epsom Common 2
page.content:
Epsom Common is one of the many places you can go to see wildlife such as birds and other animals. At the Stew Ponds we found out it can get very muddy even though attempts have been made to separate the horse path from the footpaths. We saw quite a few Damsel flies around the Stew Ponds.We also saw two grey squirrels as we entered the woods.The main trees on the common are the oak, the silver birch and the ash.
The common had lots of plants such as Bracken,Thistles,Grannies Lace,Bull Rushes and many more.
There were lots of animals like mice,rabbits.We saw some mole hills as well.If you go to Epsom common please don't drop litter.
